summary: A collection of browser‑driven integration tests for the Open Library web application, using a Selenium/Splinter session manager to automate Chrome. The tests verify end‑to‑end functionality such as user authentication, affiliate link generation, landing page UI components, loan and waitlist operations, Open Graph microdata, search behavior, and content sharing across various entity types.
business_intent: Provide automated confidence that critical user journeys and external integrations of the Open Library platform work correctly in a real browser environment, enabling reliable releases and early detection of regressions in authentication, affiliate programs, UI presentation, loan handling, metadata, and sharing features.
